channel.title: Module on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Module on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: POST /module/upload-archive
item.description: POST /module/upload-archive Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 9.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-10026 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/functional/API/02_endpoints/05_module/01_postModuleUploadArchive.ts Steps Step Description Expected result In BO, Go to Advanced Parameters > Authorization Server Authorization Server Page is displayed correctly. No records found in the table Click on the button “Add new API access” New API access Page is displayed correctly Fill the form with following data (Client ID : “Client XYZ”, Client Name: “ClientName ABC”)

No records found in the table Click on the button “Add new API access” New API access Page is displayed correctly * Fill the form with following data * Click on “Generate client secret & Save” button * The message “The API access and Client secret has been generated sucessfully” is displayed
